properties.entry: SELECT * FROM USER_HISTORY WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY LOGIN_DT DESC
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_IMG_ORIGIN = ? , USER_IMG_RENAME = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_IMG_RENAME = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT R.*, U.USER_NAME, T.REPLY_TYPE, U.USER_IMG_RENAME, CASE WHEN R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = 1 THEN C.COMM_TITLE WHEN R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = 4 THEN N.NEWS_TITLE ELSE NULL END AS TARGET_TITLE FROM REPLY R JOIN USER_INFO U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN REPLY_TYPE T ON R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = T.REPLY_TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN COMM C ON R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = 1 AND R.REPLY_TARGET_NO = C.COMM_NO LEFT JOIN NEWS N ON R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = 4 AND R.REPLY_TARGET_NO = N.NEWS_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.REPLY_ST = 'N' ORDER BY R.REPLY_DT DESC
SELECT C.COMM_NO, T.TYPE_NAME, C.COMM_TITLE FROM COMM C JOIN COMM_TYPE T ON C.COMM_TYPE = T.TYPE_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY C.COMM_NO DESC

SELECT N.NEWS_NO, N.NEWS_TITLE, N.NEWS_CONTENT, T.TEAM_NAME FROM "LIKE" L JOIN NEWS N ON N.NEWS_NO = L.LIKE_TARGET_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE LIKE_TYPE_NO = 5 AND L.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY NEWS_NO DESC
